src:
Hasil Liga Champions Tadi Malam: Madrid Pesta Gol, Juventus Menang Dramatis
07 Nov 2019, 08:05 by Anggi Tiar


Hasil Liga Champions Tadi Malam: Madrid Pesta Gol, Juventus Menang Dramatis

KBRN, Jakarta : Sebanyak delapan pertandingan Liga Champions 2019/2020 matchday keempat telah digelar pada Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari tadi. Hasilnya, beberapa tim favorit berhasil meraih kemenangan dalam laga kali ini. Sebut saja, Real Madrid yang mampu berpesta gol saat menjamu Galatasaray di Santiago Bernabeu. Ya, El Real berhasil menang telak 6-0 atas tim asal Turki tersebut. Pada laga ini, pemain muda Real Madrid Rodrygo mencetak hattrick. Tiga gol lainnya dibuat Sergio Ramos dan Karim Benzema.Berbeda dengan, Real Madrid yang mampu menang besar, Juventus justru menang secara dramatis 2-1 atas Lokomotiv Moskow berkat gol telat Douglas Costa di massa injury time babak kedua, usai keduanya bermain imbang 1-1.Selain itu, Bayern Munchen juga berhasil mengamankan poin penuh kala menjamu Olympiakos di laga Grup B Liga Champions di Allianz Arena. Dihadapan pendukungnya, Bayern menang 2-0. Namun sayang bagi Manchester City yang harus puas berbagi poin dengan Atalanata. Ya, City yang bertandang ke markas Atalanta hanya mampu bermain imbang 1-1. Berikut Hasil Lengkap Liga Champions, Kamis (7/11/2019): Pukul 00.55 WIBBayern Munchen 2-0 OlympiacosLokomotiv Moscow 1-2 JuventusPukul 03.00 WIBPSG 1-0 Club BrugeeReal Madrid 6-0 GalatasarayRed Star Belgrade 0-4 TottenhamDinamo Zagreb 3-3 Shakhtar DonetskAtalanta 1-1 Manchester CityLeverkusen 2-1 Atletico Madrid
text:
Champions League Results Last Night: Madrid Goal Feast, Juventus Wins Dramatically
Nov 7 2019, 08:05 by Anggi Tiar


Champions League Results Last Night: Madrid Goal Feast, Juventus Wins Dramatically

KBRN, Jakarta: A total of eight 2019/2020 Champions League matches for the fourth matchday have been held on Thursday (7/11/2019) early this morning. As a result, several favorite teams won in this match. You name it, Real Madrid are able to feast on goals when entertaining Galatasaray at the Santiago Bernabeu. Yes, El Real won 6-0 over the Turkish team. In this fight, Real Madrid youngster Rodrygo scored a hat trick. Three other goals were made by Sergio Ramos and Karim Benzema. Unlike Real, who were able to win big, Juventus won dramatically 2-1 over Lokomotiv Moscow thanks to Douglas Costa's late goal in the second half injury time, after both of them drew 1-1 In addition, Bayern Munich also managed to secure full points when they host Olympiakos in the Champions League Group B match at the Allianz Arena. In front of supporters, Bayern won 2-0. But unfortunately for Manchester City who must be satisfied sharing points with Atalanata. Yes, City who travel to Atalanta headquarters are only able to draw 1-1. Here are the complete results of the Champions League, Thursday (7/11/2019): 00.55 WIB Western Munich 2-0 Olympiacos Locomotiv Moscow 1-2 Juventus At 03.00 WIB PSG 1-0 Club Brugee Real Madrid 6-0 Galatasaray Red Star Belgrade 0-4 Tottenham Dinamo Zagreb 3-3 Shakhtar Donetsktalanta 1-1 Manchester CityLeverkusen 2-1 Atletico Madrid
